title: BBC Local Live: Northamptonshire for Wednesday 8 July 2015 - BBC News
summary: northamptonshire 's police & crime panel meet to consider confirming the appointment of the county 's new chief constable .
solicitors have agreed the terms of a £ 7.1m settlement with kettering general hospital in a medical negligence case .
the first northants police disciplinary hearing to be held in public has been dismissed due to `` unreliable '' evidence .

documents.title: goodbye
text: that 's all from local live in northamptonshire today .
there has been plenty of reaction to george osborne
i 'll be back tomorrow with all the news , weather , sport and travel for northamptonshire from 08:00 .
have a good evening .
author: Pete Cooper
BBC Local Live

documents.title: budget 2015 : a 'mixed bag '
text: i 've been getting the reaction of businesses to george osborne 's budget , which included a pledge for a '
john socha from northamptonshire 's federation of small businesses told me : `` it 's a bit of mixed bag , depending and where you are in the business world .
if you 're a company that pays comparatively low wages it 's going to squeeze you quite hard .
the freeze in fuel duty is good news , though . ''
author: Stuart Ratcliffe
BBC Look East

documents.title: police recover stolen riding kit
text: an estimated £ 15,000 worth of stock stolen from performance equestrian 's base in raunds has been recovered by police .
dianne beresford , who co-owns the company with her husband steve , discovered the robbery when she arrived for work on 1 july .
steve said : `` i was absolutely gutted .
we just thought that was it - that we would n't get it back . ''
the next day , the couple had a call from the police saying they may have found a van used in the burglary .
the van , abandoned in a nearby village , had all the stolen goods inside .
author: Pete Cooper
BBC Local Live

documents.title: five days to consider police chief 's appointment
text: earlier , simon edens , the man nominated to be the
after the panel questioned mr edens they entered private session in order to consider the report that will be produced following the hearing .
there is now a five day waiting period before the report from the panel regarding the proposed chief constable 's appointment is published .
so watch this space
author: Pete Cooper
BBC Local Live

documents.title: hospital negligence case about 'the truth '
text: some reaction now from solicitors involved in a medical negligence case which has seen them reach a £ 7.1m settlement with kettering general hospital .

head of clinical negligence at wilson browne solicitors , louise tyler , who handled the case , said : ''clinical negligence is not all about receiving compensation : we understand that clients are looking for answers by getting to the truth about why it happened , how it was allowed to happen and who was responsible . ''
the bbc contacted kettering general hospital , but they are yet to comment .
author: Pete Cooper
BBC Local Live

documents.title: new student accommodation
text: new images of what student accommodation at the
the brand new campus beside the river nene is due to be ready for september 2018 .
student residences will be a mix of four and five storey flats and townhouses .
a public consultation on the plans will run until the end of the month .
the new residences will be sited beside the academic buildings on waterside off bedford road .
plans also include a shop , bank and medical centre .
author: BBC Look East

documents.title: police getting used to public hearings
text: today we had the first public police misconduct hearing in northamptonshire .
those , including me , who attended
northamptonshire police said 12 conditions had been set to `` ensure '' as `` little disruption as possible '' .

observers at the hearing had to pledge not to `` leave the room or enter the room until there is a break in proceedings , '' not to use social media while evidence is presented and to remain silent at all times .
however , we were later told we could , if needed , go to the toilet , as the police got to grips with having the press and public in such hearings .
author: Elinor Cross
BBC News

documents.title: kettering general £ 7.1m negligence settlement
text: solicitors have agreed the terms of a £ 7.1m settlement with kettering general hospital in a medical negligence case .
the case related to a negligent delay in childbirth after signs of foetal distress .
this led to a lack of oxygen causing brain damage and the child was diagnosed with cerebral palsy .
the hospital accepted that 90 % of the child 's brain damage was caused by their negligence .
author: Pete Cooper
BBC Local Live

documents.title: misconduct case dismissed
text: earlier i told you i was the first public police misconduct hearing in northamptonshire .
the hearing at force headquarters is now over and the two northamptonshire police officers accused of beating a man and trapping him in his kitchen have been cleared of misconduct .
joseph livingstone said pc david scott and pc greg mead trapped him in his kitchen and punched him `` 20 to 30 times '' and smashed his head to the floor in an unprovoked attack in september 2013 .
but the panel concluded that mr livingstone 's evidence was unreliable and there was not enough evidence to continue with the case so it was dismissed .
author: Elinor Cross
BBC News

documents.title: tull 's bravery should be 'finally recognised '
text: the labour group on northampton borough council will be trying to reignite
tull was killed in world war one on the western front in 1918 .
he was promoted to officer rank during the war despite a ban on black officers being given the status .
danielle stone , leader of the labour group , said : `` northampton takes much pride in its association with walter tulll and this is rightly celebrated .
we are asking our three mps to do what they can to ensure walter 's bravery is finally recognised by being given this top honour . ''
author: Pete Cooper
BBC Local Live

documents.title: 'decent stuff ' from cobblers
text: there was a 5-2 win for northampton town last night in their pre-season friendly against non-league worthing .
gozie ugwu , ricky holmes , sam hoskins , marc richards and joel byrom all scored for the cobblers on a satisfying night for the manager chris wilder .
he said : `` we played some decent stuff going forward , created quite a few chances and it was a competitive game so we got quite a lot out of it . ''
author: Graham McKechnie
BBC Radio Northampton sport

documents.title: good morning
text: hello , welcome to today 's local live page for northamptonshire .
i 'm here in the bbc newsroom in northampton between now and 18:00 with all the latest news , sport , travel and weather for the county .
it 's budget day , so we 'll also have all the latest local reaction to what george osborne has to say .
let us know what you think via
author: Pete Cooper
BBC Local Live
